channel.title: Enviroment variables.....Hmmmmm
channel.description: so i finally launched my server and everything and to my surprise it works! YAY :D so now i decided to modify a few things and wen i tried to compile that scary message pops up ("the path can not be speci- blah blah blah) so i wonder.....wat am i doing wrong? i have all ready done the class and path thingy and i hav java 6 update 2, 11, 12, 17 and stuff. the thing i notice from various tutorials is that below the user variables where the system variables are, they have both classpath and path, but for me i only hav path. so is that the problem?, if so how do i get the classpath in?

item.title: Enviroment variables.....Hmmmmm

item.description:
@Fatal_Desire wrote:

Gotta be on Admin Acc on computer.

Read full topic

item.title: Enviroment variables.....Hmmmmm
item.dc:creator: @aznblaze aznblaze
item.description:
@aznblaze wrote:

well i tried that lin’s program thingy and it said i set it up correctly to the java but wen i click apply for some reason it wouldnt let me register it. i looked at the path and found that it was funny cuz it had my roxio and ati program, in other words it had nothing to do wit java.

Read full topic

item.title: Enviroment variables.....Hmmmmm

item.description:

so i finally launched my server and everything and to my surprise it works! YAY so now i decided to modify a few things and wen i tried to compile that scary message pops up ("the path can not be speci- blah blah blah) so i wonder…wat am i doing wrong? i have all ready done the class and path thingy and i hav java 6 update 2, 11, 12, 17 and stuff. the thing i notice from various tutorials is that below the user variables where the system variables are, they have both classpath and path, but for me i only hav path. so is that the problem?, if so how do i get the classpath in?
